review.title: “Steel Fabricator - fast paced Northern Mexico market”
review.pros: Pros – Flexible management, exciting work in custom fabricated steel business, never do the same work/project twice.
review.cons: Cons – Customers unreliable in terms of integrity and business ethics, receiveables difficult to obtain.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Locate to an area outside of Monterrey.
